title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + This Won't Hurt a Bit Tips for researching origins of a medical device
description: An investigation into the use of a medical device called a morcellator, which has been found to spread cancer during uterine surgeries.
